languages.text: "Если я призову, ты пойдешь со мной, технобрат?" {n}Дождавшись утвердительного кивка, Паскаль произносит:{/n} "Мы будем ядром".
"If I bid you to follow, will you come with me, tech-comrade?" {n}Pasqal waits for an affirmative nod and says,{/n} "We will be the core."
languages.original_text: "Если я призову, ты пойдешь со мной, технобрат?" {n}Дождавшись утвердительного кивка, Паскаль произносит:{/n} "Мы будем ядром".

traits.locale_text: "If I bid you follow, will you come with me, tech-brother?" {n}Pasqal waits for an affirmative nod and says,{/n} "We will be the core."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「自分がついてくるよう命じれば、共に来てくれるだろうか、技術同胞？」{n}パスカルは肯定のうなずきを待ってから告げる。{/n}「我々が核となろう」
languages.original_text: "If I bid you to follow, will you come with me, tech-comrade?" {n}Pasqal waits for an affirmative nod and says,{/n} "We will be the core."

traits.locale_text: 「自分がついてくるよう命じれば、共に来てくれるだろうか、技術同胞？」{n}パスカルは肯定のうなずきを待ってから告げる。{/n}「我々が核となろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我的技术伙伴，如果我希望你与我一同前进，你愿意来吗？”{n}帕斯卡继续开了口，等待着肯定的点头。{/n}“我们会共同成为核心。”
languages.original_text: "If I bid you to follow, will you come with me, tech-comrade?" {n}Pasqal waits for an affirmative nod and says,{/n} "We will be the core."

traits.locale_text: “我的技术伙伴，如果我希望你与我一同前进，你愿意来吗？”{n}帕斯卡继续开了口，等待着肯定的点头。{/n}“我们会共同成为核心。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Si je vous demande de me suivre, viendrez-vous avec moi, technoconfrère ? » {n}Dans l'attente d'une réponse affirmative, Pasqal ajoute :{/n} « Nous serons le noyau. »
languages.original_text: "If I bid you to follow, will you come with me, tech-comrade?" {n}Pasqal waits for an affirmative nod and says,{/n} "We will be the core."

traits.locale_text: « Si je vous demande de me suivre, viendrez-vous avec moi, technoconfrère ? » {n}Dans l'attente d'une réponse affirmative, Pasqal ajoute :{/n} « Nous serons le noyau. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Si le pido que me siga, ¿vendrá conmigo, tecnocamarada?». {n}Pasqal espera un asentimiento afirmativo y dice:{/n} «Seremos el núcleo».
languages.original_text: "If I bid you to follow, will you come with me, tech-comrade?" {n}Pasqal waits for an affirmative nod and says,{/n} "We will be the core."

traits.locale_text: «Si le pido que me siga, ¿vendrá conmigo, tecnocamarada?». {n}Pasqal espera un asentimiento afirmativo y dice:{/n} «Seremos el núcleo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn ich Euch bitte, mir zu folgen, kommt Ihr dann mit, Techkamerad?" {n}Pasqal wartet auf ein bestätigendes Nicken und sagt:{/n} "Wir werden der Kern sein."
languages.original_text: "If I bid you to follow, will you come with me, tech-comrade?" {n}Pasqal waits for an affirmative nod and says,{/n} "We will be the core."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich Euch bitte, mir zu folgen, kommt Ihr dann mit, Techkamerad?" {n}Pasqal wartet auf ein bestätigendes Nicken und sagt:{/n} "Wir werden der Kern sein."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Sana beni takip etmeni söylersem benimle gelir misin tekno yoldaşım?" {n}Pasqal, onaylar anlamda bir baş hareketi bekleyip ekliyor.{/n} "Çekirdek biz olacağız."
languages.original_text: "If I bid you to follow, will you come with me, tech-comrade?" {n}Pasqal waits for an affirmative nod and says,{/n} "We will be the core."

traits.locale_text: "Sana beni takip etmeni söylersem benimle gelir misin tekno yoldaşım?" {n}Pasqal onaylar anlamda bir baş hareketi bekliyor ve ekliyor:{/n} "Çekirdek biz olacağız."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
